about_the_game:
A gripping detective series filled with mystery and riddles awaits you! So you’ve opened the door to other worlds! And turns out that means so many new discoveries! For example, your friend Dr. Charles Michaelson got an invitation from the world of Innovatrix to exchange knowledge and meet the most advanced AI in the universe – Omnira. And since he invites you to come along, you become a witness to its superior intellect. But is it you or Omnira’s creator, Conrad, who has some dangerous plans on his mind? The more you get to know him and the tragic circumstances of his past, the more you suspect that a catastrophe of galactic proportions is imminent… But can you stop it? Or the worlds around you will cease to exist? Thankfully you don’t have to carry all that heroic weight alone: you’ll have Leah, Conrad’s daughter with her own personal mystery, and Fabian, a scholar from the world of Chronologists, who will be a trove of knowledge and helpful advice. Challenge your investigator skills in this spectacular new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

🌌 Your own choices!
You have the ability to choose the characters' phrases and influence the course of the adventure. The journey will challenge your intellect and entertain your senses as you delve into the intricacies of a world shaped by innovation and mystery.

🌌 Explore diverse worlds!
Traverse the realms of Innovatrix and beyond, encountering unbelievably cute robots, high-tech puzzles, and magical brain teasers. Are you ready to face the challenges and save the worlds from the brink of extinction?

🌌 Join forces!
Form alliances with Leah, Conrad's daughter harboring her own personal mystery, and Fabian, a knowledgeable scholar from the world of Chronologists. Together, tackle challenging puzzle games, gather information, and find out hidden objects to save the worlds!

🌌 Collectible items!
Delight in the diverse and innovative trinkets scattered throughout the various worlds of the seek-and-find mystery quest. Collect these unique hidden objects to unravel the deeper layers of the narrative and add a touch of color to your adventure!

Thankfully you don’t have to carry all that heroic weight alone: you’ll have Leah, Conrad’s daughter with her own personal mystery, and Fabian, a scholar from the world of Chronologists, who will be a trove of knowledge and helpful advice. pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: Who says you can't have another otherworldly, literally, adventure? You and your friend have been invited to visit the world of Innovatix! Go on an adventure soon!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
